title: paTruvEn pAdam
sahitya:
paTruvEn pAdam unadai veTri vaDivElavA nAn


anupallavi

  peTra tAi tandai pOl pEdai endanpAl nI vaTrAp-parivu kATTi vandiDumAru kOri


caraNam    ponnnaDi unadai nAn panmurai dinam pOTri innisaip-pAkkaLAl un pugazhinai shATri
innal aTru vAzhum inba sukham adaip-peTru inrum iniyenrum irundu vandiDak-kOri
